section.title: Overview
section.p:
This process describes onboarding to the 's website. It involves establishing the B2B integration between and backend systems. The points of integration with our system include the following:
daily import of product catalog data from the system
partner products available on website for purchase
enables monitoring of partner product pricing and availability
automated order placement into the system
enables automated order placement with the partner system
establishes a sales channel with the partner for commission tracking

section.title: Scope
section.p: Process scope is limited to system integration points covered in the overview. Onboarding will include one per project. If multiple onboardings are scheduled simultaneously, they are managed as separate projects. The will drive each project to completion. Completion of an onboarding results in the 's product catalog available on the site for purchase.

section.title: Stakeholders
section.p: Members of these groups share a stake in this process and will also own corresponding tasks.

section.title: Timeline
section.p: Projects are generally planned to take 4 weeks to complete. Launch dates are generally firm. When multiple onboardings occur simultaneously, project schedules should be staggered accordingly.
